instruction: Develop a climate strategy and plan to present to investors in advance of the 2022 proxy season.
output: Thank you for the instruction. Our team is committed to developing a comprehensive climate strategy and plan that aligns with the Paris Agreement goal of limiting global warming to well below 2°C relative to preindustrial levels. We understand that shareholders may use the say-on-climate vote to express concern over climate strategy and we want to ensure that our plan is credible and transparent. We will work diligently to develop and present a plan that addresses our emission trajectory and demonstrates our commitment to tackling climate change.
